DOC.brief_summary: To assess effect lanthanum carbonate ( FOSRENOL ) sevelamer carbonate ( RENVELA ) pharmacokinetics oral calcitriol ( ROCALTROL )
DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetics Rocaltrol When Administered Alone Combination With Fosrenol Renvela Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Healthy volunteer age 1945 year inclusive time consent . Satisfactory medical assessment clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) laboratory evaluation ( hematology , biochemistry , urinalysis ) assess Investigator . No current recurrent disease ( e.g . cardiovascular , renal , liver , gastrointestinal ( GI ) , malignancy condition ) could affect action , absorption disposition investigational product utilized study , could affect clinical laboratory assessment . Exclusion criterion Current recurrent disease ( eg , cardiovascular , renal , liver , GI , malignancy condition ) could affect action , absorption disposition investigational product utilized study , could affect clinical laboratory assessment . Current relevant previous physical psychiatric illness , medical disorder could require treatment make subject unlikely fully complete study , condition present undue risk investigational product study procedure . Current use medication exception hormonal replacement therapy hormonal contraceptive within 14 day first dose investigational product . History alcohol substance abuse within last year . A positive human immunodeficiency virus antibody screen , Hepatitis B surface antigen Hepatitis C virus antibody screen . Use tobacco form Donation blood blood product ( eg , plasma platelet ) within 60 day prior receive first dose investigational product .
